entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
